title: COPS: in Springfield
description: The cops of Springfield are out on the streets and doing mostly an ok job?
quote: Put out an APB for a male suspect driving a car of some sort. Heading in the direction of the, ya know, the place that sells chili. The suspect is hatless.
altHero: Chief Wiggum talks on his radio outside his police car
alt1: Chief Wiggum talks down a man standing on the ledge of a building
alt2: officers search a manâ€™s beard and find a knife
alt3: officers have guns and tanks drawn on a house but Chief Wiggum is surprised, looking at a small piece of paper
alt4: officers eating chips and watching Itchy and Scratchy on tv
